alert.note: Alert for Jackson (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 23 at 6:47PM EDT until March 23 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN RITCHIE...WIRT...NORTHERN JACKSON AND SOUTHERN WOOD COUNTIES... At 647 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ravenswood, or 8 miles north of Ripley, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Parkersburg, Ripley, Elizabeth, Ravenswood, Sandyville, Mineralwells, North Hills, Cherry, Peewee, Walker, Palestine, Cottageville, Freeport, Davisville, Greencastle, Morristown, Rockport and Leroy. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern Ohio...and central and northwestern West Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
